TopicTitle: North Star Aerospace - Planes, Spaceplanes and Rockets!

Articles.Content:
Welcome to North Star Aerospace, the home of overpowered rockets!

We offer a wide range of aerospace-craft, ranging from small crew launch rockets over SSTOs to heavy inter-planetary rockets.

In the near future, we will also offer planetary landers.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dmzfOEV3YmU

Keres 1, a crew launch vehicle to LKO and MKO:

Armstrong, a medium rocket designed to send Kerbonauts to the Mun, named after Neil Armstrong:

Kerbelta II, a medium rocket for interplanetary missions, or heavy loads to Kerbin Orbit:

Humongous Load Launcher, if you need something heavy in Orbit or beyond, look no further:

VF-1 Phoenix, a long range ramjet plane, with emergency ejection cockpit:

S-1 Valkyrie, a medium-sized SSTO Space Plane, with gliding landing and powered landing capability, as well as emergency ejection cockpit:

Mods used:

Advanced Decoupler

Radial Booster Pack

Radial Mount Parachutes

NovaPunch Remix

Silisko's BACE construction pack

Edited September 1, 2012 by SargeRho
Can you tell us exactly what craft use which mods and maybe some pics of the rockets in action? Also, flight instructions

All rockets use Nova Punch, the Phoenix uses radial boosters, Keres 1 and the Humongous Load Launcher also use Radial boosters. The advanced decoupler was only used for payloads, not for the carrier rocket itself. The Humongous Load Launcher uses the Radial Parachutes.

As for flight instructions: the rockets are flown like any normal rocket, and the S1 Valkyrie in a 60Ã‚Â° Angle up to around 40km. Cut the engines, and wait until you are at the Apoapsis for a second orbit-insertion burn. Fly at 70-75% thrust

Guess I'll have to change group name? http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/16772-North-Star-Aerospace-Grand-Opening-Salamander-Prototype

You can have North Star, Im deciding on changing mine to Diamond Baron. Just next time take care to do a thread search.

Oh...I didn't see that one. Sorry :/

I chose North Star Aerospace, as a refference to the North Star Alliance in Ground Control II. The character I based my name on - Sergeant Rho - is part of that faction.

Video added to the first post.

Edited September 1, 2012 by SargeRho
